title: The Vigilante 1947 movie serial
description:
The Vigilante: Fighting Hero of the West
1947
Columbia Pictures serial
Running time: 4 hours, 45 minutes

Columbia&#039;s 33rd serial was based on the character that first appeared in "Action Comics" No. 42, who was a radio singing cowboy who doubled as a crime-fighting, motorcycle-riding crime-fighter with a pre-teen Chinese boy, Stuff, as his answer to Batman&#039;s Robin. In the serial version, Stuff became a white, draft-age sidekick played by George Offerman Jr. Watch as the Vigilante investigates the case of the "100 Tears of Blood", which are rubies sought by a gang led by the unknown X-1 and the mysterious Prince Amil Hassan. While not the worst serial, the best thing about it remains leading lady Ramsay Ames, coming toward or going away from the camera.
